abstract: Emmanuel Eboué (born 4 June 1983) is an Ivorian footballer who plays for Galatasaray and the Ivory Coast national football team.His natural position is at right back, but is also used as a right winger. He is perhaps most famous for his time at Arsenal F.C. in the late 2000s.
